item.title: 6.057 Introduction to MATLAB, Lecture 2: Visualization and Programming
6.057 Introduction to MATLAB, Lecture 3: Solving Equations, Curve Fitting, and Numerical Techniques
6.057 Introduction to MATLAB, Lecture 4: Advanced Methods
6.057 Introduction to MATLAB, Lecture 5: Various Functions and Toolboxes
Lecture Notes
item.description: This class meets for five sessions running Monday through Friday for one week. Lecture notes are adapted from the 2010 version of this course on OCW by Danilo Šćepanović. Ses # Topics 1 Lecture 1: Introduction to MATLAB (PDF - 2.8MB) Getting Started Scripts Making Variables Manipulating Variables Basic Plotting 2 Lecture 2: Visualization and Programming (PDF - 2.3 MB) Functions Flow Control Line Plots Image/Surface Plots Efficient Codes Debugging 3
